resources.string: Hello Friend! \n I\'m Bob.... Ahh a monster save me!
You failed. \n Bob Is dead. \n Bob:"Goodbye Cruel World!"
Hello Friend!\nI\'m Bob! What should we do today?
Bob hits the road excited for his new adventure. Sadly Bob is a very literal person. He begins hitting the road first with his hands, and then with his skull. You killed Bob.

Bob, not feeling quite up for an adventure, begrudgingly begins walking down the road. He makes Eye contact with a punk kid pokemon trainer. He uses Charizard. Charizard uses Body Slam. Its super effective. Your adventure turned Bob into a pancake.
Bob loves your idea of going on an adventure. He quickly runs out into the woods. where he gets eatten by the same wolf that killed his grandmother. Your adventure killed Bob.

Bob says "I used to be an adventurer like you but then he took an arrow to the knee." The dragonborn bursts through the window and shouts. Your contract with the Dark Brotherhood concerning Bob has been completed.
Bob likes adventures. He decides to begin packing. While packing hes gets attacked by a decepticon. Bob, humanities last chance at survival, has been eradicated.
Bob would rather die than go on an adventure with you. He devours a cyanide pill. With his last breath Bob curses you. Bob\s death is on your hands.
Bob\'s wife refuses to let him go on an adventure with you. She makes Bob take out the trash. Bob gets hit by a truck. What an adventure! Bob\'s wife killed bob.

Bob wants to go on an adventure with you. You set out on and adventure to the mountains. as you approach a mountain cave a dragon flys out fo the cave burning Bob to a crisp. Bob has been incinerated.
Bob likes adventures. You go to a rock concert, meet Neil Patrick Harris, hit the night life and return home. Bob thanks you for being such a great friend.
